actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to require that certain emergency equipment be carried in any motor vehicle operated by a motor carrier to transport a charter party of passengers, a majority of whom are at least 60 years of age.

summary.text: Requires, under the Interstate Commerce Act, that a two-way radio and a respirator be carried in any motor vehicle operated by a motor carrier to transport a charter party of passengers, a majority of whom are at least sixty years of age.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to require that certain emergency equipment be carried in any motor vehicle operated by a motor carrier to transport a charter party of passengers, a majority of whom are at least 60 years of age.
